changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on enhancements to e-commerce checkout flows, pricing models, and UI components across multiple product lines (OTP, GD, MR). Major themes include box model optimization, cart handling improvements, voucher/discount functionality, and PDP carousel implementation. Several fixes address pricing updates, plan selection, and delivery detail handling.

features.name: PDP Header Carousel
features.description: New carousel component built for Product Detail Page header

features.name: OTP E-commerce Tracking
features.description: Adds e-commerce traces and experiment mapping for OTP product, including GTM and Statsig event calls on checkout success

features.name: OTP SnS Discount in Factor Form
features.description: Subscribe and Save discount functionality for OTP in Factor Form

features.name: Voucher Dashboard Tests
features.description: Test coverage for voucher functionality in dashboard

features.name: Box Model Builder Overrides
features.description: New overrides and dry packs optimization for Box Model Builder

features.name: Sticky CTAs on Select Frequency Modals
features.description: Makes call-to-action buttons sticky in Factor Form frequency selection modals

features.name: Funnel Navigation Meal Selection Memory
features.description: Displays users' previous meal selections during funnel navigation

features.name: OTP Product Families Configuration
features.description: Adds OTP product families into static config live environment

features.name: Checkout Type Parameter for Pricing
features.description: Added checkoutType parameter to schema for price calculations

decisions.what: Remove delivery interval for MR on changePlanDeliveryDetails
decisions.rationale: Simplification of delivery detail changes for MR product line

decisions.what: Use delivery form data to get first and last name
decisions.rationale: Standardize data source for customer name information in OTP flow
Code cleanup and maintenance to eliminate duplication
Prevent duplicate items in shopping cart

refactors.impact: Meal selection functionality across the application

refactors.reason: Optimize dry packs handling and add new override capabilities

fixes.issue: Price not updating on portion change in GD
Plan card price not updating on portion change in GD
Plan selection issues with portions and starter box portion config alignment
VMS discount fallback communication not working correctly

entities.name: OTP
entities.context: Multiple enhancements including e-commerce tracking, product family config, and discount functionality

entities.name: GD (Green Chef/Dinnerly)
entities.context: Price update fixes for portion changes across plan cards and general pricing

entities.name: MR (Market)
entities.context: Delivery interval removed from plan delivery details changes

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: UI improvements including sticky CTAs and SnS discount integration

entities.name: Box Model Builder
entities.context: Optimization and new override capabilities added

entities.name: PDP (Product Detail Page)
entities.context: New carousel component added to header

entities.name: GTM (Google Tag Manager)
entities.context: Event tracking integration for OTP checkout

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Experiment mapping and event tracking for OTP

key_patterns: Product-specific pricing logic requiring separate fixes across multiple product lines (GD, OTP, MR)
Progressive enhancement of checkout flow with analytics and tracking integration
Component-based architecture with reusable UI elements (carousel, modals, forms)
Test-driven development with dedicated test commits for new features
Configuration-driven product management with static config for product families
Event-driven architecture with GTM and Statsig integration for tracking
Incremental refactoring to remove code duplication while maintaining functionality
